column6: Activities, value chain and other business relationships
column7: Cleanaway is one of Australia's most prominent collectors of PET, HDPE and PP plastics through our involvement with container deposit schemes, including logistics partner for NSW's Return and Earn, Queensland and Western Australia's Containers for Change, as well as our national capability operating material recovery facilities (MRFs), which sort kerbside recycling.
The Group has over 7,500 employees at over 330 sites across Australian states and territories, many of whom are in frontline operational roles.
The total number of part-time workers in FY23 was 145 employees.
The group governance structure comprises the Audit and Risk Committee, Sustainability Committee, and Human Resource Committee.
